title: Skarners Passive Should Effect Your Whole Team
body: I think they should buff skarners{{champion:72}}  passive

replies.body: I personally agree but it would be op

Thanks StarTraveller and i agree it would be OP so they could Nerf the buff maybe depending on how many champs there are in it at once.
It would make running from lane to lane quicker though

Because having a super tanky hard hitting slowing suppresing monster that can q every other auto attack isn't good enough? I'm confused here.

But on the serious side, that would essentially be a free better Talisman of Accension for everyone at level 1. That is absolutely broken.
